Articles.Content: I will have this locked when 0.22 comes out, and will be reopened at version 0.54 (total randomness) so START POSTING!!!
this is already a thing. i don't think we need another time capsule.
Hello, posters of the future, I come from the past. 13th, October of 2013, precisely.

I contribute a picture.

I imagine I will look much the same in ten years. Probably a bit more beard.

The current acceleration due to gravity on planet Earth is 9.81 meters per second.

The commonly accepted language among the nation of England is English, currently.

$10 USD is currently worth $10 USD
But we already have one.....
I most certainly hope you are around then Whackjob; your creations never fail to make me chuckle! And 10 years to reach 0.54? I find your lack of faith in the devs disturbing...

But we already have one.....

and we with apollo 11 landed on the moon ONCE, and yet we did it many more times... so, more time capsules XD

I most certainly hope you are around then Whackjob; your creations never fail to make me chuckle! And 10 years to reach 0.54? I find your lack of faith in the devs disturbing...

I would imagine this time next year we are at the point of say .60 maybe more. I think the devs can pull it off myself

well that IS if they do not break major things during each update cycle XD
Something I made for a livestream a while ago:

I imagine I will look much the same in ten years. Probably a bit more beard.

Your beard looks fuzzy and glorious.

I contribute a picture.

I imagine I will look much the same in ten years. Probably a bit more beard.

"My name is Whackjob, king of kings:

Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!"

Your beard looks fuzzy and glorious.

I shell out the extra five bucks for the volumizing conditioner for it.

"My name is Whackjob, king of kings:

Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!"

"... nothing beside remains."

"... nothing beside remains."

"...Round the decay

Of that colossal Rockomax Jumbo-64 Fuel Tank, boundless and bare

The lone and level sands stretch far away."

"...Round the decay

Of that colossal Rockomax Jumbo-64 Fuel Tank, boundless and bare

The lone and level sands stretch far away."

Whackzandius, 1818.
I'm completely in favour for another time capsule (for those who don't know, i started the original)
Please stay on topic. About 5 days (even if it's released!) before lockdown!

0.54? I think it is very likely that we will jump over that number to 1.0. Will the time capsule also be opened in that case?

People of the future, is this prediction correct?

0.54? I think it is very likely that we will jump over that number to 1.0. Will the time capsule also be opened in that case?

People of the future, is this prediction correct?

People from the future says: I don't know; since last server crash all posts pre 2014 were lost.
As of October 14th, 2013, Jeb smiles. Does he do so in teh futurez?

Kerbals of the future, do you remember Kethane? Mission Controller? SIDR? Tosh's carts? They all had a purpose at some point.

I am also in favor of a reopening of this thread @version 1.0, assuming we never hit 0.54.

I want people who just get it at 1.0 to know, once- we only had 158 parts stock. Once- We only had a max limit of 4 in a command pod.

Mod- Close it now, it is now 23.5, past the .22 limit :|
In because W naaaaa!

We is denying the part that this should be closed!

TIME FO MOAR PAZT STUPH!
